name: 7-20-4 - R.G. Series Connecticut - Torpedo
additionalNotes:
Kurt A. Kendall breathed new life into the venerable “7-20-4″ brand name, acquiring the trademark for the original 7-20-4 line. Kendall, is a successful New Hampshire cigar retailer, with three stores in the state. He became intrigued with the historic brand, and acquired the defunct trademark in 
7-20-4, this cigar is blended for every palate. The generous flavor of both 7-20-4 lines satisfies even seasoned veterans, and newer smokers aren’t overwhelmed by the body.
